             2016 
                             
                                             
     Aug 2, 2016 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Announces Cessation Of Negotiations In Respect Of Financing For Phase I Potash Mine And Announces Its Annual Meeting Of Shareholders 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Announces Cessation Of Negotiations In Respect Of Financing For Phase I Potash Mine And Announces Its Annual Meeting Of Shareholders CALGARY, AB (August 2, 2016) – Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX; KRN) announces the cessation of negotiations with Gujarat State Fertilizers and Chemicals Limited (“GSFC”) in respect of the proposed USD 700 million financing ...  Read More 
 
                                             
     Jul 14, 2016 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Releases Updated Technical Report For Potash And Magnesium Mine At Wynyard, Saskatchewan 
 
     Karnalyte Resources Inc. Releases Updated Technical Report For Potash And Magnesium Mine At Wynyard, Saskatchewan “Helping Farmers Succeed” Not for distribution to U.S. news wire services or dissemination in the United States. SASKATOON, SK (CNW–July 14, 2016) - Karnalyte Resources Inc. (“Karnalyte” or the “Company”) (TSX: KRN) today released an updated NI 43-101 compliant technical report (the “Technical Report”) for ...
